title: After update my Pixel 3 XL to QP1A.191005.007, I can't find "Carrier Operator" setting.
content:
I buy my Pixel 3 XL from Taiwan google store web site.


My Pixel 3 XL has update to Android 10 and build number is "QP1A.191005.007". After I enable the developer mode.


I can't find Carrier Operator" in Settings > Network & internet > Mobile network > Advanced.


So, My question is "How can I add my eSim to Pixel 3 XL(with Android 10, build number: QP1A.191005.007)?"
